verses.verse: Then all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> lifted <S%H5375><s%> up their voices <S%H6963><s%> and cried, <S%H5414><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> wept <S%H1058><s%> that night. <S%H3915><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> grumbled <S%H9235><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron; <S%H175><s%> and the whole <S%H3605><s%> congregation <S%H5712><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Would <S%H3863><s%> that we had died <S%H4191><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt! <S%H4714><s%> Or <S%H176><s%> would <S%H3863><s%> that we had died <S%H4191><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> wilderness! <S%H4057><s%>

"And why <S%H4100><s%> is the Lord <S%H3068><s%> bringing <S%H935><s%> us into this <S%H2088><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> to fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>? Our wives <S%H802><s%> and our little <S%H2945><s%> ones <S%H2945><s%> will become <S%H1961><s%> plunder; <S%H957><s%> would it not be better <S%H2896><s%> for us to return <S%H7725><s%> to Egypt <S%H4714><s%>?"
So they said <S%H559><s%> to one <S%H376><s%> another, <S%H251><s%> "Let us appoint <S%H5414><s%> a leader <S%H7218><s%> and return <S%H7725><s%> to Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>"

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on their faces <S%H6440><s%> in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> and Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh, <S%H3312><s%> of those who had spied <S%H8446><s%> out the land, <S%H776><s%> tore <S%H7167><s%> their clothes; <S%H899><s%>

and they spoke <S%H559><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "The land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> we passed <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H5674><s%> to spy <S%H8446><s%> out is an exceedingly <S%H3966><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> land. <S%H776><s%>

"If <S%H518><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is pleased <S%H2654><s%> with us, then He will bring <S%H935><s%> us into this <S%H2088><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> it to us – a land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> flows <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey. <S%H1706><s%>

"Only <S%H389><s%> do not rebel <S%H4775><s%> against the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> and do not fear <S%H3372><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> for they shall be our prey. <S%H3899><s%> Their protection <S%H6738><s%> has been removed <S%H5493><s%> from them, and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is with us; do not fear <S%H3372><s%> them."

But all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to stone <S%H7275><s%> them with stones. <S%H68><s%> Then the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "How <S%H575><s%> long <S%H5704><s%> will this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> spurn <S%H5006><s%> Me? And how <S%H575><s%> long <S%H5704><s%> will they not believe <S%H539><s%> in Me, despite all <S%H3605><s%> the signs <S%H226><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have performed <S%H6213><s%> in their midst <S%H7130><s%>?

"I will smite <S%H5221><s%> them with pestilence <S%H1698><s%> and dispossess <S%H3423><s%> them, and I will make <S%H6213><s%> you into a nation <S%H1471><s%> greater <S%H1419><s%> and mightier <S%H6099><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> they."

But Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "Then the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> will hear <S%H8085><s%> of it, for by Thy strength <S%H3581><s%> Thou didst bring <S%H5927><s%> up this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> from their midst, <S%H7130><s%>

and they will tell <S%H559><s%> [it] to the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> land. <S%H776><s%> They have heard <S%H8085><s%> that Thou, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> art in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> for Thou, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> art seen <S%H7200><s%> eye <S%H5869><s%> to eye, <S%H5869><s%> while Thy cloud <S%H6051><s%> stands <S%H5975><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them; and Thou dost go <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of cloud <S%H6051><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%> and in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> by night. <S%H3915><s%>

"Now if Thou dost slay <S%H5221><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> as one <S%H259><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> then the nations <S%H1471><s%> who <S%H834><s%> have heard <S%H8085><s%> of Thy fame <S%H8088><s%> will say, <S%H559><s%>

'Because <S%H4480><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not bring <S%H935><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He promised <S%H7650><s%> them by oath, <S%H7650><s%> therefore He slaughtered <S%H7819><s%> them in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>'
"But now, <S%H6258><s%> I pray, <S%H4994><s%> let the power <S%H3581><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> be great, <S%H1431><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as Thou hast declared, <S%H1696><s%> <S%H559><s%>

'The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is slow <S%H750><s%> to anger <S%H639><s%> and abundant <S%H7227><s%> in lovingkindness, <S%H2617><s%> forgiving <S%H5375><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> and transgression; <S%H6588><s%> but He will by no <S%H3808><s%> means <S%H5352><s%> clear <S%H5352><s%> [the guilty,] visiting <S%H6485><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the fathers on the children <S%H1><s%> to the third <S%H1121><s%> and the fourth <S%H8029><s%> [generations.]'

"Pardon, <S%H5545><s%> I pray, <S%H4994><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> according to the greatness <S%H1433><s%> of Thy lovingkindness, <S%H2617><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as Thou also hast forgiven <S%H5375><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> from Egypt <S%H4714><s%> even until <S%H5704><s%> now. <S%H2008><s%>"
So the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "I have pardoned <S%H5545><s%> [them] according to your word; <S%H1697><s%>
but indeed, <S%H199><s%> as I live, <S%H2416><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> will be filled <S%H4390><s%> with the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"Surely <S%H3588><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> who have seen <S%H7200><s%> My glory <S%H9202><s%> and My signs, <S%H226><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I performed <S%H6213><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> yet have put <S%H5254><s%> Me to the test <S%H5254><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> and have not listened <S%H8085><s%> to My voice, <S%H6963><s%>

shall by no <S%H518><s%> means <S%H518><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H7650><s%> to their fathers, nor <S%H1><s%> shall any <S%H3808><s%> of those who spurned <S%H3605><s%> Me see <S%H5006><s%> it.

"But My servant <S%H5650><s%> Caleb, <S%H3612><s%> because <S%H6118><s%> he has <S%H5973><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> a different <S%H312><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> and has followed <S%H310><s%> Me fully, <S%H4390><s%> I will bring <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he entered, <S%H935><s%> and his descendants <S%H2233><s%> shall take <S%H3423><s%> possession <S%H3423><s%> of it.

"Now the Amalekites <S%H6003><s%> and the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> live <S%H3427><s%> in the valleys; <S%H6010><s%> turn <S%H6437><s%> tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> and set <S%H5265><s%> out to the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the Red <S%H5488><s%> <S%H3220><s%> Sea. <S%H3220><s%>"
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"How <S%H4970><s%> long <S%H5704><s%> <S%H4970><s%> [shall I bear] with this <S%H2088><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> congregation <S%H5712><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are grumbling <S%H9235><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Me? I have heard <S%H8085><s%> the complaints <S%H8519><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they are making <S%H9235><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Me.

"Say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'As I live, <S%H2416><s%>' says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> 'just <S%H9201><s%> as you have spoken <S%H1696><s%> in My hearing, <S%H241><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> I will surely do <S%H6213><s%> to you;

your corpses <S%H6297><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> even all <S%H3605><s%> your numbered <S%H6485><s%> men, according to your complete <S%H3605><s%> number <S%H4557><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> who <S%H834><s%> have grumbled <S%H9235><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Me.

'Surely <S%H518><s%> you shall not come <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to settle <S%H7931><s%> you, except <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun. <S%H5126><s%>

'Your children, <S%H2945><s%> however, whom <S%H834><s%> you said <S%H559><s%> would become <S%H1961><s%> a prey <S%H957><s%> – I will bring <S%H935><s%> them in, and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have rejected. <S%H3988><s%>
'But as for you, your corpses <S%H6297><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

'And your sons <S%H1121><s%> shall be shepherds <S%H7462><s%> for forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and they shall suffer <S%H5375><s%> [for] your unfaithfulness, <S%H2184><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> your corpses <S%H6297><s%> lie <S%H8552><s%> in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

'According to the number <S%H4557><s%> of days <S%H3117><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you spied <S%H8446><s%> out the land, <S%H776><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> for every <S%H3117><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> you shall bear <S%H5375><s%> your guilt <S%H5771><s%> a year, <S%H8141><s%> [even] forty <S%H705><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> My opposition. <S%H8569><s%>

'I, the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> have spoken, <S%H1696><s%> surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> I will do <S%H6213><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> congregation <S%H5712><s%> who are gathered <S%H3259><s%> together against <S%H5921><s%> Me. In this <S%H2088><s%> wilderness <S%H4057><s%> they shall be destroyed, <S%H8552><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> they shall die. <S%H4191><s%>' "

As for the men <S%H376><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to spy <S%H8446><s%> out the land <S%H776><s%> and who returned <S%H7725><s%> and made all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> grumble <S%H9235><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him by bringing <S%H3318><s%> out a bad <S%H1681><s%> report <S%H1681><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%>

even those men <S%H376><s%> who brought <S%H3318><s%> out the very bad <S%H1681><s%> <S%H7451><s%> report <S%H1681><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> by a plague <S%H4046><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

But Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> and Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> remained <S%H2421><s%> alive <S%H2421><s%> out of those <S%H1992><s%> men <S%H376><s%> who went <S%H1980><s%> to spy <S%H8446><s%> out the land. <S%H776><s%>

And when Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> mourned <S%H56><s%> greatly. <S%H3966><s%>

In the morning, <S%H1242><s%> however, they rose <S%H7925><s%> up early <S%H7925><s%> and went <S%H5927><s%> up to the ridge <S%H7218><s%> of the hill <S%H2022><s%> country, <S%H2022><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Here <S%H2009><s%> we are; we have indeed <S%H3588><s%> sinned, <S%H2398><s%> but we will go <S%H5927><s%> up to the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has promised. <S%H559><s%>"

But Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Why <S%H4100><s%> then <S%H2088><s%> are you transgressing <S%H5674><s%> the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> when it will not succeed <S%H6743><s%>?

"Do not go <S%H5927><s%> up, lest <S%H3808><s%> you be struck <S%H5062><s%> down <S%H5062><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your enemies, <S%H340><s%> for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is not among <S%H7130><s%> you.

"For the Amalekites <S%H6003><s%> and the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> will be there <S%H8033><s%> in front <S%H6440><s%> of you, and you will fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> inasmuch <S%H3588><s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> as you have turned <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> from following <S%H310><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%> And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will not be with you."

But they went <S%H5927><s%> up heedlessly <S%H9424><s%> to the ridge <S%H7218><s%> of the hill <S%H2022><s%> country; <S%H2022><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> left <S%H4185><s%> the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

Then the Amalekites <S%H6003><s%> and the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in that hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> came <S%H3381><s%> down, <S%H3381><s%> and struck <S%H5221><s%> them and beat <S%H3807><s%> them down <S%H3807><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as Hormah. <S%H2767><s%>
